member.name: T:My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:joanelibweb.buttonHandler
member.summary: This class provides an image handler as an HTTP handler.

members.member:
***********************************************************************
This routine creates a button with the passed text.
Set to the text to place on the button
Bitmap of button that was created

member.name: T:joanelibweb.fileDownloadHandler
member.summary: This class provides a file download handler as an HTTP handler.

members.member:
***********************************************************************
This property defines whether another HTTP handler can reuse this instance of the handler.
False
False is always returned since this handler is synchronous and is not pooled.

***********************************************************************
This routine provides the processing for the http request. It is responsible for reading the file from the local filesystem and writing it to the response object.
Set to the current HttpContext
